normal.name: Midlevel Control Room
normal.mecanims:
● Apophis does not have a shield here
● Blast attack has huge radius, can be blocked with Omnium Handcannon
● Generally the same attack pattern as the Apophis World Boss

heroic.name: (Heroic) Midlevel Control Room
heroic.mecanims:
● Apophis does not have a shield here
● Blast attack has huge radius, can be blocked with Omnium Handcannon
● Generally the same attack pattern as the Apophis World Boss

normal.name: Phantasmic Zenith
normal.mecanims:
● Both Frigg and Valkyrie must be defeated at the same time.
● There are two portals; one leads to Frigg, the other leads to Valkyrie

heroic.name: (Heroic) Phantasmic Zenith
heroic.mecanims:
● Both Frigg and Valkyrie must be defeated at the same time.
● There are two portals; one leads to Frigg, the other leads to Valkyrie

normal.name: Shattered Realm
normal.boss: Clone Angel: Dark Star I and Clone Angel: Dark Star II
normal.mecanims:
● Two bosses much like Frigg and Valkyrie
● If the bosses are close to one another, they will begin to heal rapidly.
● A random teammate will be taken into a different dimension and receive damage over time; under any circumstances, **do not die here**
● The other players must break the shield as quickly as possible if this happens.

heroic.name: (Heroic) Shattered Realm
heroic.boss: Clone Angel: Dark Star I and Clone Angel: Dark Star II
heroic.mecanims:
● Two bosses much like Frigg and Valkyrie
● If the bosses are close to one another, they will begin to heal rapidly.
● A random teammate will be taken into a different dimension and receive damage over time; under any circumstances, **do not die here**
● The other players must break the shield as quickly as possible if this happens.
